text: @TeamPelosi Oh. So this is why you put your relative Newsom up to moving the new covid-19 strain into California from Mexico. So you can make this tweet ! So you were the one who put Newsom up to breaking the Federal Quarantine Law ! Bravo 1st responder Murderer !
